articles.title: Zegna’s Trendy I.P.O. Path Raises Question: Is This the Next Big Fashion Trend? - The New York Times
articles.description: In a sign of the luxury industry’s revival from pandemic lows, the company went public through a SPAC on Monday.
articles.content: To further ensure its supply chain, Zegna teamed with Prada this year to each buy 40 percent of the Italian cashmere producer Filati Biagioli Modesto, and Mr. Zegna said Zegna might use proceeds from… [+2377 chars]
